Cells were stained for surface markers with the following antibodies (BioLegend): anti-CD3 (HIT3a), anti-TCRVδ2 (B6), anti-TCRγ9 (B3), anti-CD25 (BC96), anti-CD69 (FN50), anti-NKG2D (1D11), anti-Fas (DX2), anti-FasL (NOK-1), anti-TRAIL (RIK-2), anti-CD107a (H4A3), anti-CD14 (63D3) and anti-CD137 (4B4-1). For intracellular staining, cells were fixed, permeabilized, and then stained with anti-IFN-γ (B27), anti-perforin (B-D48), anti-granzyme B (QA16A02) and anti-granzyme A (CB9) antibodies or relevant isotype control antibodies as described previously.
31 All samples were acquired with a FACS LSR II (BD) and analyzed with FlowJo software (Tree Star).
